nano.remexp.broadcaster
Class RemExpSocketAcceptor

java.lang.Object
  nano.remexp.ThreadHandler
      nano.remexp.broadcaster.RemExpSocketAcceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RemExpSocketAcceptor
extends ThreadHandler

This thread runs on the defined port until a socket has been connected and stops then. This class is used to connect to the remote experiments server, accepting inbound connection from the remote experiment.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

Constructor Summary
RemExpSocketAcceptor(RemoteExperimentBroadcaster socketAcceptor)
          The constructor needs the port on which the thread listens for a socket and the server instance that will be informed about the connected socket.
 
Method Summary
 void addHost(java.lang.String host)
          Add a host to the list of hosts which are allowed to connect to the remote experiment broadcaster as remote experiment.
 void addPort(int port)
          Only after the port has been added, this thread starts to run and listen on the defined port.
 void doTask()
          Runs until a socket connection has been found, incoming from the correct url.
 void shutDown()
          Used to force the shutdown the instance if stopThread didn't lead to a successful shut down or an immediate shutdown is needed.

didExitRunMethod, getThreadName, isAliveThread, run, start, stopThread

Constructor Detail

RemExpSocketAcceptor

public RemExpSocketAcceptor(RemoteExperimentBroadcaster socketAcceptor)
The constructor needs the port on which the thread listens for a socket and the server instance that will be informed about the connected socket.

Parameters:
socketAcceptor - The object that receives the sockets once they are connected.
Method Detail

addPort

public void addPort(int port)
Only after the port has been added, this thread starts to run and listen on the defined port.

Parameters:
port - the port where this thread shall listen for a new remote experiment connection.

addHost

public void addHost(java.lang.String host)
Add a host to the list of hosts which are allowed to connect to the remote experiment broadcaster as remote experiment.

Parameters:
host - the allowed host

doTask

Runs until a socket connection has been found, incoming from the correct url.
